abstract: United States Sec of Commerce Penny Pritzker tells Cuban officials US is seeking business opportunities in nation despite long embargo.
lead_paragraph: Commerce Secretary Penny Pritzker’s visit highlights the obstacles to the opening of relations with Havana championed by the Obama administration.

headline.main: U.S. Commerce Chief Makes a Pitch in Cuba
headline.print_headline: U.S. Commerce Chief Makes a Pitch in Cuba

snippet: Commerce Secretary Penny Pritzker’s visit highlights the obstacles to the opening of relations with Havana championed by the Obama administration.
